title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Garmin G1000 NXi - Creating user-defined hold
description:
In our previous video about the Garmin G1000 NXi we discussed the new options available including the hold feature. At that specific time I couldn't find how to use the option. Luckily I found how to do it using the Garmin G1000 NXi manual. In this video we will look at how to configure a user-defined hold and what the effect of that hold will be on the flight plan and the instruments in the cockpit.
